page.title: 18HOBBIES OF B.J.PADLEY
page.content: My mum has a strange hobby,she collects dolls and shop dummies.She has roughly 30 old dolls and a lot of modern dolls. My dad and mum share a hobby,dad takes photos of peoples pets and mum then does a painting in watercolour and chalk which the people buy. She does a lot of sewing and knitting which is good cause if I want any different clothes she makes them for me.Iam wearing a T shirt and trousers that she made. She also makes clothes for other people as she is a tailoress,but that is still a hobby she says as she doesn't do it all the time. She leads a busy life as she also runs our house and keeps it clean and tidy. She cooks and cleans every day,while I'm at school or out playing.
